import React from 'react' import { Nav, NavItem, NavLink } from 'reactstrap' import '../styles.css' const Sidebar = ({ isOpen, onClose, dataset, totalUsers, selectedUsers }) => { const totalDuration = selectedUsers.reduce( (total, user) => total + user.duration, 0 ) const datasetInfo = [ { label: 'Dataset Name', value: dataset }, { label: 'Number of Users', value: `${selectedUsers.length} / ${totalUsers}`, }, { label: 'Dataset Duration', value: `${totalDuration} seconds` }, ] return ( isOpen && (
e.clientX > 250 && onClose()}>

{item.label}: {item.value}
))}

) ) } export default Sidebar
